content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Organize your workplace at home similar to the one at the office. Keep a clean area, make sure it has natural sunlight and it is setup in an area you feel productive.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":66829,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4747b0a2-2b6c-421f-a3cc-ab86810fb07a/Picture31.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4747b0a2-2b6c-421f-a3cc-ab86810fb07a/Picture31.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture31.png\",\"name\":\"Picture31.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"4747b0a2-2b6c-421f-a3cc-ab86810fb07a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":466,\"height\":284},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Working from home can make you feel isolated. To avoid this feeling, get in touch with your co-workers by messaging them (Teams) or any other means to contact them by video. You can set up virtual meetings and enjoy a coffee break together.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Practical Tips for Dealing With the Isolation of Working From Home\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":1206279,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b9436122-e814-4671-baf4-9c6778897b3a/Picture32.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b9436122-e814-4671-baf4-9c6778897b3a/Picture32.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture32.png\",\"name\":\"Picture32.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"b9436122-e814-4671-baf4-9c6778897b3a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":832,\"height\":271},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":196150,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b7cb957e-f6c2-45fb-961f-ae9f5faf886c/Picture34.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b7cb957e-f6c2-45fb-961f-ae9f5faf886c/Picture34.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture34.png\",\"name\":\"Picture34.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"b7cb957e-f6c2-45fb-961f-ae9f5faf886c\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":541,\"height\":441},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Analyse in which part of the day you are more productive and channel your energy in that part of the day. You will be more efficient and productive.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":19443,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c8780daf-487f-4283-aa50-0b009b1091fc/Picture35.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c8780daf-487f-4283-aa50-0b009b1091fc/Picture35.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture35.png\",\"name\":\"Picture35.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"c8780daf-487f-4283-aa50-0b009b1091fc\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":193,\"height\":193},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Keep your daily routine unchanged even when little ones are around you:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":199418,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d3926d3c-4fec-42d6-b222-603692986916/Picture36.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d3926d3c-4fec-42d6-b222-603692986916/Picture36.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture36.png\",\"name\":\"Picture36.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"d3926d3c-4fec-42d6-b222-603692986916\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":295,\"height\":153},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Establish order\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Establish a schedule with your daily activities, including breaks in which you can entertain little ones. Do various activities together. You can manage unexpected situations by planning your activities carefully and you can create a safer place for you and your loved ones.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Communication is essential\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When it comes to keeping a balance in your professional life it’s ok to be transparent about your children. Yes, it’s OK to remind your colleagues that during conversation with them it’s possible that at any moment your child can enter the room or let them know when you need to take a break to deal with a situation.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Set up rules with your children\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Set up a way of communicating with your children, if you can’t be interrupted during an activity or a meeting. Practice an “I am busy gesture” beforehand. Let them know if you need to have silence in the house. Don’t forget to reward the little ones if they respect the rules.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
